welcome_message_body: Welcome to Chigorodo, Colombia! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city known for its beautiful landscapes, rich culture, and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore and enjoy everything Chigorodo has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chigorodo Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chigorodo Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This is the main terminal of Apartado Airport, handling both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to handling cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free wifi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gonzalo Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Gonzalo Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
